dev.zkxs.neosmodloader.name: Neos Mod Loader
dev.zkxs.neosmodloader.description: A mod loader for Neos VR.

1.11.2.changelog: AssemblyName is now ALWAYS NeosModLoader, because apparently Windows requires this? Adds some extra logging for what nml_libs get loaded

1.9.1.changelog: Logging improvements, splash screen visuals, JSON config serialization changes

1.8.0.changelog: Release the new mod configuration system

net.pardeike.harmony.name: Harmony
net.pardeike.harmony.description: A library for patching, replacing and decorating .NET and Mono methods during runtime.

me.art0007i.SpecialItemsLib.name: SpecialItemsLib
me.art0007i.SpecialItemsLib.description: A library which allows other mods to easily add custom special items to be shown in the inventory.

net.eia485.morereferenceproxies.description: Adds reference proxy sources to bag editors and list editors

dev.zkxs.neosdesktoptoolshortcutremapper.name: DesktopToolShortcutRemapper
dev.zkxs.neosdesktoptoolshortcutremapper.description: Fully configurable number key bindings for spawning arbitrary tools. You do not need to restart Neos to apply changes.

artifacts.changelog:
- Internally rename mod from NeosDesktopToolShortcutRemapper to DesktopToolShortcutRemapper.
- Add configuration system support. Config keys match Kazu's fork exactly, so you can seamlessly migrate.

net.kazu0617.desktoptoolshortcutremapper.name: DesktopToolShortcutRemapper (kazu's fork)

net.eia485.noleftjump.description: Disables your left thumbstick being used as a jump

net.eia485.privacyshield.description: Makes popup requests for geting assets from urls

dev.zkxs.neosplatformspoof.name: NeosPlatformSpoof

dev.zkxs.neoslocomotionrename.description: Lets you rename your locomotion modules

dev.zkxs.neosnoresetscale.description: Removes the "Reset Scale" context menu function

dev.kokoa.savetowhere.name: SaveToWhere
dev.kokoa.savetowhere.description: Displays the save destination for the save to inventory button

me.badhaloninja.neosmodsettings.name: ModSettings
me.badhaloninja.neosmodsettings.description: Adds a dash screen to edit mod configs

net.rampa3.3ddashonscreen.name: 3DDashOnScreen
net.rampa3.3ddashonscreen.description: replaces 2D overlay dash in Screen mode with the regular 3D one

2.0.0.changelog:
- Fixed spotty behaviour of the UI Edit Mode key
 - Made UI Edit Mode key user selectable - F4 is default key
 - Restored VR behaviour of the camera controls UI

3.0.0.changelog:
- Added automated compatibility tweak - if the mod detects badhaloninja's DesktopNotifications installed, the VR notification restoration patch is automatically disabled
 - Camera Controls UI can be now released from its slider - can be turned on in mod config, requires Neos restart on change

3.1.0.changelog: - restored desktop tab control panel keybind and made it configurable

3.2.0.changelog: - added ability to disable the mod trough mod config (requires Neos restart to take effect)

3.3.0.changelog: - patched out the grab lock forcing last grabbed item to stay grabbed if dash is opened

3.4.0.changelog: - compatibility hotfix for compatibility with ExitAndDiscardHomesKeybind

net.rampa3.ExitAndDiscardHomesKeybind.name: ExitAndDiscardHomesKeybind
net.rampa3.ExitAndDiscardHomesKeybind.description: allows to exit without saving changes in home world using Ctrl+Alt+F4 key shortcut

1.0.0.changelog: - initial relese, adds the keybind and can be disabled trough mod config

net.eia485.allowmultipleaudiostreams.name: AllowMultipleAudioStreams
net.eia485.allowmultipleaudiostreams.description: Allows you to spawn multiple audio streams

1.1.0.changelog: Added support for host access requests

net.Toxic_Cookie.GenericSettings.description: Allows you to define, save, load and use custom settings

net.eia485.cheese4all.description: Enables the top secret cheese mode

net.eia485.showhiddennodes.description: Shows hidden nodes in the node browser

Banane9.BetterLogixWiresThatCanScroll.description: Optimizes and optionally animates LogiX wires.

DoubleStyx.SsaoTweaks.description: Allows the individual parameters of the SSAO effect to be configured.

Banane9.RenameDirectlyLinkedDynVars.description: Renames directly linked dynamic variables alongside the namespace they're bound to.

Banane9.PacifistAprilFoolsExplosion.description: Can individually hide each part of the ViolentAprilFoolsExplosion.

Banane9.EditorTabbing.description: Allows moving between UIX text inputs in the inspector or anywhere else with tab, with a fallback when Steam Overlay could be triggered with shift+tab.

dev.zkxs.neoscloudhomeaccesslevel.name: CloudHomeAccessLevel
dev.zkxs.neoscloudhomeaccesslevel.description: Lets you configure your cloud home's default access level

1.1.0.changelog:
- add hide from listing config
- remove enabled config (it didn't actually do anything of value in version 1.0.0)

Banane9.AvatarClothingHelper.name: AvatarClothingHelper
Banane9.AvatarClothingHelper.description: Automatically sets up Blendshapes with the same name on multiple renderers to be driven by the primary mesh's values on import or when pressing a button on the SkinnedMeshRenderer.

Banane9.NoEscape.name: NoEscape
Banane9.NoEscape.description: Can disable the emergency respawn / disconnect gesture.

me.badhaloninja.FixAltEnter.name: FixAltEnter
me.badhaloninja.FixAltEnter.description: Fixes returning to fullscreen via alt + enter not respecting monitor resolution

tk.deltawolf.LogixCleanupWizard.name: LogixCleanupWizard
tk.deltawolf.LogixCleanupWizard.description: Provides a wizard for cleaning up leftover logiX components.

1.0.2.changelog:
Fixes empty Ref removal
Status messages no longer are cleared

1.0.1.changelog:
Tag Wizard as Developer
Remove Harmony requirement
Should now work regardless of language

me.badhaloninja.ReverseAudioClip.name: ReverseAudioClip
me.badhaloninja.ReverseAudioClip.description: Adds a button to reverse an audio clip

dev.zkxs.neosvoicequality.name: VoiceQuality
dev.zkxs.neosvoicequality.description: Lets you easily change your own voice stream's bitrate

1.1.0.changelog: adds ability to change opus application type and frame size

me.art0007i.CastNodeHotline.name: CastNodeHotline
me.art0007i.CastNodeHotline.description: Makes cast nodes not delete themselves automatically. This fixes the cast bug.

tk.deltawolf.NeosBetterGizmos.name: NeosBetterGizmos
tk.deltawolf.NeosBetterGizmos.description: Gizmo buttons will automatically face you.

me.art0007i.StackTraceFixer.name: StackTraceFixer
me.art0007i.StackTraceFixer.description: Removes stack traces from places where they should have never been

net.LeCloutPanda.InspectorCustomizer.name: InspectorCustomizer

net.LeCloutPanda.VideoToStream.name: Video To Stream
net.LeCloutPanda.VideoToStream.description: Sets Video Players spawned by the player to automatically set Stream to true.

Banane9.LagFreeContactsLoading.name: LagFreeContactsLoading
Banane9.LagFreeContactsLoading.description: Spreads out the initial loading of the contacts list over a configurable number of updates to prevent the game from freezing while it adds all the contacts.

dev.Kodu.ViveForAll.name: ViveForAll
dev.Kodu.ViveForAll.description: Brings HTC Vive single button App / Localspace toggle functionality to other controllers.

Psychpsyo.PrivacyPlus.name: PrivacyPlus
Psychpsyo.PrivacyPlus.description: Hides your Discord and Steam IDs from other users in a session.

net.lexevo.NeosDisableGamepads.name: NeosDisableGamepads
net.lexevo.NeosDisableGamepads.description: Disables all gamepad inputs (eg. from an Xbox controller) for Neos!

me.badhaloninja.ComponentAttacherFavorit.name: ComponentAttacherFavorites
me.badhaloninja.ComponentAttacherFavorit.description: Adds the ability to save favorite components

tk.deltawolf.SettingsRedux.name: SettingsRedux
tk.deltawolf.SettingsRedux.description: Replaces the default Neos Settings page with an enhanced settings page that adds in many QoL changes

net.Sox.EasyVoiceMessage.name: EasyVoiceMessage
net.Sox.EasyVoiceMessage.description: Allows you to record voice messages without having to keep your laser on the tiny square button. (although your laser needs to stay on your dash)

Psychpsyo.TNMTMISTYFANLTTSSYCREANKNOWSBI.name: The Neos Mod That Makes It So That Your Fingers Are No Longer Trusted Touch Sources So You Can Rest Easy At Night Knowing No One Will Shove Buttons Into Your Hand Without Your Permission

Psychpsyo.DefaultVoiceMode.description: Gives you the option to set what voice mode should be active when the game starts.

Psychpsyo.Tooltippery.description: Adds the capability for other mods and users to add hover tooltips to buttons.

net.Toxic_Cookie.DefaultToAnisotropic.description: Import textures using Anisotropic filtering by default

Psychpsyo.DiscordVR.description: Adds a Discord tab to your dash, next to the contacts tab.

net.eia485.allowCompSpawn.name: AllowCompSpawn
net.eia485.allowCompSpawn.description: Allows spawning worker inspectors from held syncrefs unconditionally
